function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on the impact of contagious diseases in the built environment","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases leading to public health risks","Mitigation":"Include a discussion of the impact of contagious diseases on place-making and urban development","Technologies":"Use of urban planning and design strategies to mitigate disease transmission","People":"General public, urban residents, tourists","Owner":"Urban planners, architects, public health officials"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of virtual places and their potential role in disease transmission","Impact":"Neglect of virtual environments as potential vectors for disease spread","Mitigation":"Explore the impact of virtual places on contagious disease propagation and integrate virtual space design with public health measures","Technologies":"Digital surveillance, virtual environment modeling","People":"Digital space designers, public health experts","Owner":"Tech companies, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Failure to address global trends and their implications on disease propagation","Impact":"Lack of preparedness for global disease spread due to neglect of global trends","Mitigation":"Incorporate global trends and movements into urban planning and public health strategies to address potential global disease transmission","Technologies":"Global disease monitoring systems, data analytics for trend analysis","People":"International travelers, migrants, global citizens","Owner":"International health organizations, urban planners, policymakers"}]}
